1.0.0.name: wordpress/wordpress-tweet-button
1.0.0.description:
Add the official tweet button to your WordPress blog to let people share content on Twitter without having to leave the page. Promote strategic Twitter accounts at the same time while driving traffic to your web site.

If you are using TweetMeme button switch to this immediately, you will no longer have wrong Tweet count for your posts.

I'll be adding tags as hash tags soon.
